titles: Taylor's motto Et habeo, et careo, et curo.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
Cockson, Thomas, engraver.
publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for I T[rundle] & H G[osson],
notes: A reply to: Wither, George.  Wither's motto.
The title page is engraved and signed: TC, i.e. Thomas Cockson.
Printer's and booksellers' names from STC.
In this edition B4r line 1 has "Libles".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Wither, George, 1588-1667. --  Wither's motto --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
